<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Reclaim Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1246) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Reprepare Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=661)

</column>

---

You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the _resonant reflections_. You reclaim the magic of an ongoing spell, using it reprepare a spell with a duration. You Dismiss a Spell of 4th level or lower that you cast today from a spell slot with at least half its duration remaining, even if that spell can't normally be Dismissed. You can then spend 10 minutes to reprepare the spell in that spell slot, as [Reprepare Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=661).

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

Characters who have reached 20th level can choose from the following feats, representing the pinnacle of mortal power influenced by their triumphs.

**Related Feats**: [Annihilating Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=1240), [Astonishing Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1241), [Banishing Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1242), [Denier of Destruction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1243), [Endurance of the Rooted Tree](/Feats.aspx?ID=1244), [Mimic Protections](/Feats.aspx?ID=1245), [Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247), [Ringmaster's Introduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1248), [Steal Essence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1249), [Tenacious Blood Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1250), [Verdant Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1251)
